body_html: Even if the gradient is defined into the core, it has to be put in the gradient registry in order to be used by the AddSymbolicGradients method. Basically register grad has to be called, and it is not the case.

body: Even if the gradient is defined into the core, it has to be put in the gradient registry in order to be used by the  AddSymbolicGradients method. Basically register grad has to be called, and it is not the case.
